plot: Two telepaths with a story of rivalry face each other in a mental battle. Their memories are revealed as they fight. The stronger memory beats the weak memory, in a series of bloody strokes...
title: O Combate
plot_es: Two telepaths with a story of rivalry face each other in a mental battle. Their memories are revealed as they fight. The stronger memory beats the weak memory, in a series of bloody strokes...
plot_en: Two telepaths with a story of rivalry face each other in a mental battle. Their memories are revealed as they fight. The stronger memory beats the weak memory, in a series of bloody strokes...
